Table of Contents

Namespace MdFilesMerger.Domain.Entity

Classes

IgnoredFile

Implementation of ignored file model associated with .md file located in main directory, whose content won't be included in created merged file.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> BaseDirectory -> MdFile -> RelativeFile -> IgnoredFile
Implements: IComparable<T>, IDirectory, IItem, IRelativeFile

MainDirectory

Base directory for selected and ignored files.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> BaseDirectory -> MainDirectory
Implements: IComparable<T>, IDirectory, IItem, IMainDirectory

MenuAction

Representation of menu item.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> MenuAction
Implements: IItem, IMenuAction

MergedFile

Implementation of merged file model.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> BaseDirectory -> MdFile -> MergedFile
Implements: IComparable<T>, IDirectory, IEditFile, IItem, IMergedFile

SelectedFile

Implementation of selected file model associated with located in main directory .md file, whose content will be included in created merged file.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> BaseDirectory -> MdFile -> RelativeFile -> SelectedFile
Implements: IComparable<T>, IDirectory, IEditFile, IItem, IRelativeFile, ISelectedFile

User

Implementation of user model.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> User
Implements: IItem, IUser
